H0.text: The water flows into a river after reaching the ocean in the water cycle.

H1.text: The water falls from the clouds after reaching the ocean as part of the water cycle.

H2.text: The water sinks to the ocean floor after reaching the ocean in the water cycle.

H3.text: The water changes into water vapor after reaching the ocean in the water cycle.

A4.text: The ocean is the source of 86% of global evaporation.
